Name: World Boss
About the game: Join Fresh and LazarBeam in the battle for the World Boss crown in this fast-paced casual FPS. 16 players duke it out in semi-persistent lobbies as they level up, select custom arsenals of weapons and perks, and climb the leaderboard to become “World Boss” . With a focus on skill and experimentation, this unique mix of io-inspired gameplay and roguelike progression is a lightweight and accessible multiplayer experience for all ages. How long can you hold the crown? A new title from PlaySide Studios, creators of Age of Darkness: Final Stand, partnering with some of the world’s most well-loved content creators.
Meta Title: World Boss: Oct 19, 2022, PlaySide and Full Overview
